text: Producer-san, if you don't mind, here...

...Hm?
Ah, a handkerchief... Chiyuki sewed this?

Oh, there's embroidery in the bottom left...
It's cute.

Yes, I embroidered flowers matching our three image
colors, like the decorations on our costumes and shoes.

I was worried it might be...
a bit too cute...

No, this is lovely too.
Thank you, I'll cherish it.

Heheh, since the three of us made matching
accessories, I thought it'd be nice for you too...
